entry.title: Building an Intake-esm catalog from CESM2 History Files
entry.content:
This notebook will walk through how to utilize existing packages in the Python ecosystem (PyART, Xarray, and hvPlot) to visualize data from a vertically pointing Ka-band radar

Before starting up this notebook, make sure to download your data from the ARM data portal, using this link!
entry.summary: This notebook will walk through how to utilize existing packages in the Python ecosystem (PyART, Xarray, and hvPlot) to visualize data from a vertically pointing Ka-band radarBefore starting up this notebook, make sure to download your data from the ARM data portal, using this link!KAZR radar
